title: Drawing, "An Altar Lamp in the Family Chapel of the Honorati in the Cathedral in Jesi", ca. 1775
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray, yellow, brown and red watercolor over black chalk on white laid paper
provenance:
Giovanni Piancastelli
Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Design for a lamp to be executed in partly gilded metals.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "An Altar Lamp in the Family Chapel of the Honorati in the Cathedral in Jesi", ca. 1775.
ca. 1775. Pen and black ink, brush and gray, yellow, brown and red watercolor over black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3259.
